mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BG_OFFICEITEM_WF (id, requester, request_dept, request_date, remark, item_name, item_number, create_dept, creator, create_time, request_flag) values ('${id}', '${creator}', '${createDept}', to_date('${requestDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), '${remark}', '${itemName}', '${itemNumber}', '${createDept}', '${creator}', sysdate, '0')
mapper.select: select t.id, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.requester) requester, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(t.request_dept) requestDept, to_char(t.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(t.request_date,'hh24:mi') as requestDate, func_get_userdicvalue(t.item_name,'BGHC') itemNameShow, t.item_name itemName, t.remark, t.item_number from T_BG_OFFICEITEM_WF t WHERE id =#{id} ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BG_OFFICEITEM_WF SET id=#{id}, request_date = to_date(#{requestDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), remark = #{remark}, item_name = #{itemName}, item_number = #{itemNumber}, changer = #{changer}, change_dept = #{changeDept}, change_time = sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
